name: Magikarp

evolution.description: Magikarp can evolve into Gyarados at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 16 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Fish Pokémon. Famous for being very unreliable. It can be found swimming in seas, lakes, rivers, and shallow puddles.

abilities.name: Swift Swim
abilities.description: This Pokémon's speed is doubled in rainy conditions.

abilities.name: Rattled
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a damaging Dark, Bug, or Ghost move, it makes its next attack at advantage.
